description:
The testing continues even at 32,000 feet. Mumei and his classmates are especially challenged when their plane begins to experience mysterious turbulence. Meanwhile, while on an outing with his classmate, Haku, Mumei encounters a new rival. Who is this young man and why does he know so much about pens?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attention Please! CA to Sora ni Asobe
Attention Please! Play in the Sky with CA <3
Attention please ! Amusons-nous dans le ciel avec CA !
アテンションプリーズ! CAと空に遊べ♡
